name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and detachable keyboard.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro
description: AMD Ryzen 7, 16GB RAM, NVIDIA RTX 3060, and 165Hz display.

name: Realme 14X
description: Realme 14X, powered by a 6000mAh battery with 45W fast charging, offers 5G connectivity for blazing-fast internet speeds. It features a 6.5-inch AMOLED FHD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate. The IP69 splash-proof rating ensures durability, while the 50MP AI triple-camera system captures stunning photos.

name: LG Washing Machine
description: This LG 7kg front-load washing machine comes equipped with smart inverter technology for energy-efficient performance. Its 6 Motion Direct Drive ensures a gentle yet thorough wash for delicate fabrics. The machine features a stainless steel drum, silent operation, and a child-lock feature.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch features the powerful M2 Max chip, 16GB unified memory, and a 512GB SSD for top-tier performance. Its Liquid Retina XDR display delivers incredible color accuracy, perfect for professionals. It also boasts a Magic Keyboard, macOS Ventura, and a 21-hour battery life.

name: iPhone 16
description: The iPhone 16 features an A15 Bionic chip for blazing-fast performance and 128GB storage. Its 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display offers immersive visuals. The dual-camera system with Night Mode ensures professional-grade photos, while 5G support provides seamless connectivity.

name: iPhone Pro Max 15
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max is powered by the A16 Bionic chip and features a 6.7-inch ProMotion XDR display. With a 256GB storage capacity and a 48MP triple-camera system, it is perfect for photography enthusiasts. Enjoy longer battery life and cutting-edge performance.

name: Asus Vivobook 15
description: Asus Vivobook 15 is designed for productivity and portability, featuring an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD. The 15.6-inch FHD anti-glare display is perfect for long hours of work. Its lightweight design and robust build make it an ideal companion for students and professionals.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor and features a 6.1-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. Its triple-camera setup includes a 50MP main sensor for exceptional photography. The 128GB storage and 5G support make it future-ready.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Sony WH-1000XM5 wireless headphones offer industry-leading noise cancellation, up to 30 hours of battery life, and Hi-Res Audio certification. With adaptive sound control and Speak-to-Chat features, these headphones provide an immersive and personalized audio experience.

name: HP Envy x360
description: The HP Envy x360 features a 13th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and a 512GB SSD. This convertible laptop comes with a 15.6-inch FHD touchscreen, Intel Iris Xe graphics, and a backlit keyboard. It offers long-lasting battery life and is perfect for work and entertainment.

name: Canon EOS R50
description: The Canon EOS R50 is a mirrorless camera featuring a 24.2MP APS-C sensor and Dual Pixel CMOS AF II. With 4K UHD video recording, DIGIC X processor, and a vari-angle LCD touchscreen, it is perfect for photographers and videographers seeking professional-grade quality.

name: Samsung 55-inch QLED TV
description: Samsung's 55-inch QLED TV offers 4K UHD resolution with Quantum Dot technology for stunning visuals. It features HDR10+ support, Dolby Atmos audio, and a sleek design. With smart TV functionality, enjoy seamless streaming from your favorite apps.

name: Fitbit Versa 4
description: The Fitbit Versa 4 features advanced health and fitness tracking, including built-in GPS and sleep monitoring. It offers 6+ days of battery life, Active Zone Minutes, and a slim design for all-day wear. Compatible with Android and iOS devices.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: The Dell XPS 13 Plus is powered by an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD. It features an InfinityEdge 13.4-inch touchscreen display, a sleek aluminum chassis, and advanced thermal management. Perfect for power users on the go.

name: Dyson V15 Detect
description: The Dyson V15 Detect cordless vacuum cleaner features laser dirt detection for precise cleaning. It offers powerful suction, a HEPA filter, and a digital display showing performance metrics. Lightweight and easy to maneuver, it is ideal for deep cleaning.

name: Google Pixel 7
description: Google Pixel 7, powered by the Tensor G2 chip, features a 6.3-inch FHD+ OLED display and 128GB storage. Its advanced AI-powered camera system ensures incredible photos and videos. The Pixel 7 also includes built-in Google Assistant and 5G support.

name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
description: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II deliver best-in-class noise cancellation and immersive sound. With personalized audio tuning, up to 6 hours of battery life per charge, and a comfortable fit, they are perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: The Sony PlayStation 5 offers lightning-fast load times and stunning 4K gaming performance. Featuring a custom SSD, DualSense wireless controller, and 3D audio support, it delivers an unparalleled gaming experience for enthusiasts.

name: Microsoft Surface Pro 9
description: The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 features an Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Its 13-inch PixelSense touchscreen and detachable keyboard offer versatility for work and creativity. With all-day battery life, it is ideal for professionals.

name: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro
description: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro, powered by AMD Ryzen 7 and NVIDIA RTX 3060, features a 16-inch QHD display with a 165Hz refresh rate. With 16GB RAM and 1TB SSD, it offers powerful performance for gaming and multitasking. Ideal for gamers and creators.
